import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{useSearchParams}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function App(){const[searchParams]=useSearchParams();const[track,setTrack]=useState(null);const[audio,setAudio]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const id=searchParams.get("id");useEffect(()=>{async function fetchTrack(){try{const res=await fetch("https://your-backend-url.onrender.com/track/".concat(id));const data=await res.json();setTrack(data);setAudio(new Audio(data.url));setLoading(false);}catch(err){console.error("Hiba a dal bet√∂lt√©sekor",err);}}if(id)fetchTrack();},[id]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-center",children:"Bet\xF6lt\xE9s..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"min-h-screen flex flex-col justify-center items-center gap-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-xl",children:["\uD83C\uDFB5 ",track.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-gray-500",children:["\uD83D\uDC64 ",track.artist]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex gap-4 mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>audio.play(),className:"bg-green-600 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded",children:"Lej\xE1tsz\xE1s"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>audio.pause(),className:"bg-red-600 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded",children:"Meg\xE1ll\xEDt\xE1s"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>window.location.href="/",className:"bg-gray-600 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded",children:"\xDAj QR"})]})]});}// P√©lda frontend React komponens
